rows.label: qev091103_MSG0001
rows.name: Phog! You okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091103_MSG0002
rows.name: F-Frye...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091103_MSG0003
rows.name: Nnngh...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091103_MSG0004
rows.name: [ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091103_MSG0005
rows.name: I... I'll live.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091103_MSG0006
rows.name:
We held them till the 12th wave...
Then it all fell apart...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091103_MSG0007
rows.name: It's amazing you made it that long.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091103_MSG0008
rows.name: We h-had to... This is...our home...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091103_MSG0009
rows.name: [ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091103_MSG0010
rows.name: We'll take care of this. You just hang on![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091103_MSG0011
rows.name: Right...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091103_MSG0012
rows.name: You ready? We're not letting this city fall![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091103_JNK0010
rows.name: Nod

rows.label: qev091103_SEL0011
rows.name: Confirm that you're ready to go.

rows.label: qev091103_JNK0020
rows.name: Shake Head

rows.label: qev091103_SEL0021
rows.name: Say that you need time to prepare.

rows.label: qev091103_MSG0013
rows.name: I think we're through the worst of it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091103_MSG0014
rows.name: Hang in there, Phog. Help's coming.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091103_MSG0015
rows.name: Thank you. Both of you. I'm really glad to see you safe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091103_MSG0016
rows.name:
Man, Phog, I'm sorry.
I really had you wrong these last few years.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091103_MSG0017
rows.name: I was a little surprised you came running here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091103_MSG0018
rows.name: Hey, you're blood! Only damn family I got left.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091103_MSG0019
rows.name:
You keep family safe, whatever it takes.
Same as you did for New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091103_MSG0020
rows.name: Frye... Can I tell you something?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091103_MSG0021
rows.name: Anything—AFTER we get you checked out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091103_MSG0022
rows.name: No, I want to say this now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091103_MSG0023
rows.name:
Dad said an old man like him had no place
taking some kid's spot on the Whale.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091103_MSG0024
rows.name: He sacrificed himself so others could live.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091103_MSG0025
rows.name: ...Yeah, of course he did. Goddamn old fool.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091103_MSG0026
rows.name: I never stopped to think of it like that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091103_MSG0027
rows.name:
Never thought about how dying can
sometimes save someone else.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091103_MSG0028
rows.name:
In my head, saving lives was all about
fighting on the front lines.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091103_MSG0029
rows.name: Sounds like you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091103_MSG0030
rows.name: More like you! At least today.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091103_MSG0031
rows.name:
Dad would've fought for the city, too.
He'd be a heap of bruises like you are.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091103_MSG0032
rows.name:
I thought you were cold, but you've got Dad's fire.
Maybe more than me, even.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091103_MSG0033
rows.name: I'm sorry I didn't see that, Bro.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091103_MSG0034
rows.name: Frye, I...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091103_MSG0036
rows.name:
Look, please don't apologize.
I just want things to be like they were.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091103_MSG0037
rows.name:
Heh. Then what say we hit the diner
for a few after-work rounds?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091103_MSG0038
rows.name: Perfect. I could tip back a gallon of milk right about now![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091103_MSG0039
rows.name: Which is still gross, by the way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091103_MSG0040
rows.name: You're coming too, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091103_JNK0030
rows.name: Accept

rows.label: qev091103_SEL0031
rows.name: Say that you wouldn't miss it.

rows.label: qev091103_JNK0040
rows.name: Decline

rows.label: qev091103_SEL0041
rows.name: Give the brothers some time to catch up.

rows.label: qev091103_MSG0041
rows.name:
We've got years of history to catch up on.
Let's party till dawn![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091103_MSG0042
rows.name:
Aw, don't be like that.
You're practically family at this point![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091103_MSG0043
rows.name: I'd like you there, actually.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091103_MSG0044
rows.name:
Once Frye gets spun up, he starts rambling—
I could use a translator.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091103_MSG0045
rows.name: Hey, watch it, buddy![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091103_MSG0046
rows.name: Hang on, Frye! Please![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091103_MSG0047
rows.name: A h-hostile... It was...shining...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091103_MSG0048
rows.name:
Now I'm seeing [ST:playername ]...? Please...
Thin their...numbers for me... Just a little...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091103_MSG0049
rows.name: A star...? No... That's...that's a hostile![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091103_MSG0050
rows.name:
Frye! [ST:playername ]! At this rate we'll
never weather the 13th wave of hostiles!
You have to clear them out now![ST:wait ]
